Author: kbotha
Summary: Azure managed Disk optimization report. The script will identify and Map Azure Managedisk to OS disk. It can also give a recommendation on Drive space based on Sku and sizing. Pricing might not be accurate and can be updated via https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/m
Title: Azure Managed Disk Report - Cost Optimization
UserTags: Azure Managed Disk, Azure Disk, Azure Cost
